name: Fabula Nova Turducken
description:
A collection of older games forming the Fabula Nova Turducken trilogy. Created during the year 2016. I have since then lost the source files.

1. COOKING MADDAN 2016
  • The most accurate quarterback chef game around.
2. TURDUCKEN TROUBLE
  • Rescue your precious turduckens in this classic GameBoy trap 'em up!
3. CANDY CREEPER
  • Halloween scare 'em up. Take candy from babies.
  • Featuring special guest artist: Pat Webster.
